[[inst_v_rdfadd]]
==== V.RDFADD

*Syntax:* v.rdfadd SrcL.<T>, ->Dst<.W>

*Description:* Reduce: performs floating-point add operation across all vector elements.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_v_rdfadd_part1.svg[V.RDFADD encoding,width=800]

*Group:* VEC/VEC
